details.command: python3 train.py --arch resnet18 --dataset CIFAR10 --k ${k} --exp-mode finetune --exp-name resnet18_ratio${k}_std_auto --trainer base --val-method base --resume results/resnet18/resnet18_ratio${k}_std_auto/finetune/latest_exp/checkpoint/checkpoint.pth.tar --result-dir results --use_trainable_router --router_arch resnet18
